title: Second Half of Life Hot (feat. Andy Fiori)
description: Jay and Dan contemplate the marriage between Sofia Vegara and Joe Manganiello. Dan discusses going “Zero to Sixty” after getting bumped at the Stress Factory for the comedic stylings of Marlon Wayans. After watching the trailer for "Black Adam" the Bonfire hosts think up some superheroes of their own. Bonfire family Andy Fiori discusses his technique for accelerated love in the age of quarantine.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Comedy Central)
